title: Drop and Give Me Twenty! DGMT!
creator: Nicolas Kijak

extendedInfo.description: 100 pushup program tracking app. Guides you along the 6 week program complete with tests that automatically vary the difficulty as you go!  Chose your entry method:* Counts on nose touch* Manual entry that records time* Proximity Sensor (where available)Reset and level changes

reviews.title: Nice and simple
reviews.comment: Add some kind of Tone after the rest period is up an this is pretty perfect. Maybe the work out dates would be nice as well. Squats and Pull ups? Maybe in the future..
reviews.author: Kevin Burke

reviews.title: Good, but can\'t give feedback
reviews.comment: Good app, but it adds too many situps/pushups at the end. I would like to give app some sort of feedback if the exercise is too easy or hard and modify the count of added situps/pushups.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app, small flaw
reviews.comment: Good application. It motivates to be able to keep track of the number of push ups done. Unfortunately the graph tracker does not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just flat good...
reviews.comment: .does what it say and for me it has been very effective! Would love to see pull-ups as well clean and simple...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I think
reviews.comment: I think the developer gave up on this app. No changes to this app in 2 years now. Moving on
reviews.author: aaron goldstein

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Gets me motivated! Easy to keep track and now I am able to do more push ups and sit ups than I ever could without getting fatigued. Love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is the best app for counting my push-ups and situps, I use it ever other day. Today is my 12th time doing pushups and at first all I could do was 35 and now I\'m doing a whopping 130!!! I can\'t believe my eyes and I\'m pretty sure I\'m doing them right since my coach has been watching me doing them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Stopping to take breaks is for the weak... It does work as told but i found it destroyed the purpose of true pushing you when i found out it gives you mandatory breaks with no option to remove them... Dev i know im only one, but id greatly appreciate if you could make those stops optional.
reviews.author: German Serrano

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Only a few days in, but man o man this is a great app. Clean interface, easy to use. Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'m unmotivated
reviews.comment: This is perfect to motivate my flabby belly. I know how much I\'m doing which is incentive enough
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good bye flab
reviews.comment: Useful; encouraging; motivating
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wish it told you how many to do in each set, also the sensor on the situps seems to lock up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app!  Kinda like having a personal trainer. Graph doesn\'t always display results. HTC Sensation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No graph
reviews.comment: I was excited about this appb but got frustrated that th graph didn\'t work right. It would lose the data for m previous workouts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy s2, works well, finally something that can motivate to work out and see my progress
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rob
reviews.comment: I decided to do a reset to start again and sadly it won\'t show my progress now, shame as it was a good app, please fix.
reviews.author: Robert Menzies

reviews.comment: Great app! I do feel like the reminder part of the app needs upgrading to get 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motivating!
reviews.comment: Nice reminders and excellent measurement for free. Has a bug with not displaying results on the graph always and doesn\'t always keep the screen on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Progress bars don\'t show up, but it\'s great. Situp incorporated was a great idea, no one has a pull up app, if dgmt made that it\'d be great. OptimusV
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Tracker
reviews.comment: I\'d like an option to show the date instead of a workout number.
reviews.author: A Google User
